API Reference

Complete API documentation for all Synapse packages

@snps/core

The heart of the Synapse framework with HTTP server, middleware, caching, performance monitoring, WebSocket support, logging, configuration management, error handling, and monitoring dashboard.

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 45KB

Classes

Server

Main HTTP server class with middleware support, caching, and performance monitoring

Methods
start(callback: () => void): Promise>

Starts the HTTP server on the specified port

use(middleware: (req, res, next) => void): Server

Adds middleware to the server

WebSocketManager

Manages WebSocket connections and real-time communication

Methods
sendToClient(clientId: string, message: any): boolean

Sends a message to a specific WebSocket client

@snps/routing

Advanced routing system with path matching, parameters, middleware support, and route grouping.

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 12KB

Classes

Router

Main router class for handling HTTP routes

Methods
get(path: string, handler: (req, res) => void): Router

Registers a GET route handler

@snps/database

In-memory database with ORM capabilities, QueryBuilder, Model class, relationships, and validation.

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 28KB

Classes

Database

Main database class for data persistence

Methods
connect(): Promise>

Connects to the database

Model

Base class for ORM models

Methods
save(): Promise>

Saves the model instance to the database

@snps/auth

Comprehensive authentication and authorization system with OAuth2, JWT, and security features

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 25KB

Classes

AuthManager

Main authentication manager with OAuth2 and JWT support

Methods
login(): Promise>

Authenticate user with credentials

logout(): Promise>

Logout current user

@snps/templating

Advanced templating engine with .webml support, variables, conditionals, and loops

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 15KB

Classes

TemplateEngine

Main templating engine for .webml files

Methods
render(): Promise>

Render template with data

@snps/testing

Comprehensive testing framework with mocks, spies, stubs, and 100% coverage tools

Version: 1.0.0
Category: core
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 30KB

Classes

TestRunner

Main test runner with parallel execution and coverage reporting

Methods
run(): Promise>

Run all tests

@snps/ui

Comprehensive vanilla TypeScript UI component library with 600+ bulletproof components for Synapse framework

Version: 1.0.0
Category: development
Test Coverage: 100%
Bundle Size: 45KB

Classes

SynapseUI

Main UI library class with component management and theming

Methods
createComponent(name: string, props: Record): HTMLElement

Create a component by name with props

mount(component: HTMLElement, container: string | HTMLElement): HTMLElement

Mount a component to the DOM

setTheme(theme: string): void

Set the current theme

ComponentFactory

Factory for creating and registering components

Methods
register(name: string, factory: ComponentFactoryFunction): void

Register a component factory

create(name: string, props: Record): HTMLElement

Create a component by name
